title: Social: Photos (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Photos subcategory within Social. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: Please let me take your picture.
cards.japanese: 写真を撮らせてください。

cards.english: Please let me take a picture with you.
cards.romaji: Shashin o issho ni torasete kudasai.
cards.japanese: 写真を一緒に撮らせてください。
写真を撮らせてください。

cards.english: Photo, together, let me take, please.
cards.romaji: Shashin o issho ni torasete kudasai.
cards.japanese: 写真を一緒に撮らせてください。
